commands.name: help
commands.description: Shows you some useful links, including this page

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Shows you my ping to discord's servers

commands.name: suggest
commands.description: Suggest a feature

commands.name: invite
commands.description: Sends my invite link

commands.name: vote
commands.description: Sends a link to Fire on a random bot list (sends direct vote link if you use the "vote" alias)

commands.name: oss
commands.description: Sends my GitHub repo link

commands.name: public
commands.description: Set your server to public (see command below)

commands.name: discover
commands.description: Links to Fire's public servers page

commands.name: status
commands.description: Get Fire's status

commands.name: dstatus
commands.description: Get Discord's status

commands.name: skin
commands.description: See a player's Minecraft skin

commands.name: mcstatus
commands.description: Check the status of Minecraft services

commands.name: mcuuid
commands.description: Get a player's UUID (without dashes)

commands.name: meme
commands.description: Get a random meme

commands.name: lyrics
commands.description: Get the lyrics for a song (Provide a member to search for their current song on Spotify)

commands.name: baninfo
commands.description: Get info about a ban on KSoft.Si

commands.name: levelhead
commands.description: Get a player's levelhead info

commands.name: modcore
commands.description: Get a player's modcore profile

commands.name: mod
commands.description: Get information about a Sk1er LLC mod

commands.name: yt
commands.description: Get the top 5 trending videos in the US

commands.name: yt info
commands.description: Get a video's info from an ID or URL

commands.name: makeameme
commands.description: Make your own meme using the "top text, bottom text" format

commands.name: deepfry
commands.description: Deepfry an image or your avatar (your avatar is used if no argument is provided)

commands.name: ticket
commands.description: View all the ticket configuration commands

commands.name: ticket category
commands.description: Set the category where tickets are made

commands.name: ticket name
commands.description: Set the name for tickets. Run the command without arguments to see all available variables

commands.name: new
commands.description: Makes a new ticket

commands.name: add
commands.description: Add a user to the current ticket

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Remove a user from the current ticket

commands.name: close
commands.description: Closes a ticket, uploads the transcript to action logs channel and sends to the ticket author

commands.name: log
commands.description: Set the channel(s) for logging

commands.name: description
commands.description: Set the description for the server that shows in Vanity URLs

commands.name: modonly
commands.description: Set channels to restrict commands for moderators

commands.name: adminonly
commands.description: Set channels to restrict commands for admins

commands.name: joinmsg
commands.description: Set the join message and a channel to send it in

commands.name: leavemsg
commands.description: Set the leave message and a channel to send it in

commands.name: linkfilter
commands.description: Enable different link filters. Run the command without arguments to see all filters

commands.name: filterexcl
commands.description: Exclude channels/roles/members from the filters

commands.name: command
commands.description: Enable/disable a command in your server

commands.name: ban
commands.description: Ban a user from the server
commands.aliases: banish, begone, gtfo, 410, perish, bonk, bean

commands.name: unban
commands.description: Unban a user from the server

commands.name: softban
commands.description: Bans a user, deletes messages from a specified amount of days and then unbans.

commands.name: muterole
commands.description: Sets the muted role Fire will use

commands.name: mute
commands.description: Mute a user.
commands.usage: {prefix}mute <user> [<time> <reason>] Time format: 1d 2h 3m 4s == 1 day, 2 hours, 3 minutes and 4 seconds

commands.name: unmute
commands.description: Unmute a muted user.

commands.name: warn
commands.description: Warn a user.

commands.name: warnings
commands.description: View warnings for a user

commands.name: clearwarns
commands.description: Clear a users warnings

commands.name: clearwarn
commands.description: Clear a single warning

commands.name: modlogs
commands.description: View moderation logs for a user

commands.name: kick
commands.description: Kick a user.

commands.name: block
commands.description: Mute a user/role in the current channel.

commands.name: unblock
commands.description: Unmute a user/role who has been blocked in the current channel.

commands.name: derank
commands.description: Remove all roles from a user (The role must be below Fire's highest role to be removed)

commands.name: user
commands.description: Get a general overview of a user.
commands.aliases: userinfo, info user, infouser, whois, u

commands.name: role
commands.description: Get a general overview of a role

commands.name: guild
commands.description: Get a general overview of the guild

name: Tags
Note: Creating/deleting tags requires "Manage Messages" permission. Tag names can only be one word.

commands.name: tag
commands.description: See a list of all tags or view a tag

commands.name: raw
commands.description: View the raw content of a tag

commands.name: create
commands.description: Create a new tag

commands.name: delete
commands.description: Delete a tag

commands.name: slowmode
commands.description: Set the slowmode for a channel or category

commands.name: debug
commands.description: Debug a command

commands.name: quote
commands.description: Quote a message from an id or url

commands.name: steal
commands.description: Steal an emote to use in your own server

commands.name: autoquote
commands.description: Enable automatic quoting when a message url is sent

commands.name: remind
commands.description: Set a reminder and get reminded because that's what reminders are for. (Uses the same time format as tempmutes, DAYSd HOURSh etc.)

commands.name: reminders
commands.description: List all reminders you have set

commands.name: delremind
commands.description: Delete a reminder using the index from the reminders command

commands.name: avatar
commands.description: Get a user's avatar

commands.name: vanityurl
commands.description: Creates a vanity invite for your Discord using inv.wtf

commands.name: google
commands.description: Talk to the Google Assistant

name: Purge
Note:
The purge command makes use of a flag system for different options. 
For example, "purge 10 --user Geek --match oof" would purge the last 10 messages from the user Geek if it contains oof

commands.name: purge
commands.description: Bulk delete messages

flags.name: include_embeds
flags.description: Whether or not to search embeds for match/startswith/endswith/invite

flags.name: nomatch
flags.description: Purge messages that do not contain a string

flags.name: startswith
flags.description: Purge messages starting with a string

flags.name: endswith
flags.description: Purge messages ending with a string

commands.name: autorole
commands.description: Automatically add a role to a user when they join (Use command without role argument to disable or "delay" to toggle waiting for a message)

commands.name: invrole
commands.description: Automatically add a role to a user when they join with a specific invite

commands.name: addrank
commands.description: Add a role that users can join through the rank command.

commands.name: delrank
commands.description: Remove a rank from the list of joinable roles.

commands.name: rank
commands.description: List all available ranks and join a rank

commands.name: rolepersist
commands.description: Add a role(s) that will stay with the user, even if they leave and rejoin.

commands.name: redirect
commands.description: Create a redirect to any website using inv.wtf, e.g. inv.wtf/bot. Use "$redirect <slug> delete" to delete the redirect.
